languages.text: The guide, the ruler, and the higher power to which Humanity offers their prayers for aid and deliverance. Most would be driven mad with despair if they knew the truth.
languages.original_text: Проводник, правитель и высшая сила, к которой Человечество обращает свои молитвы о помощи и избавлении. Большинство людей лишилось бы рассудка, узнай они истину.

traits.locale_text: The guide, the ruler, and the higher power to which Humanity offers their prayers for aid and deliverance. Most would be driven mad with despair if they knew the truth.
The guide, the ruler, and the higher power to which Humanity offers their prayers for aid and deliverance. Most would be driven mad with despair if they knew the truth.
The guide, the ruler, and the higher power to which Humanity offers their prayers for aid and deliverance. Most would be driven mad with despair if they knew the truth.
The guide, the ruler, and the higher power to which Humanity offers their prayers for aid and deliverance. Most would be driven mad with despair if they knew the truth.

languages.text: Проводник, правитель и высшая сила, к которой Человечество обращает свои молитвы о помощи и избавлении. Большинство людей лишилось бы рассудка, узнай они истину.
Der Anführer, der Herrscher und die höhere Macht, an die die Menschheit ihre Gebete um Hilfe und Erlösung richtet. Würden sie die Wahrheit kennen, würden die meisten vor Verzweiflung durchdrehen.
languages.original_text: The guide, the ruler, and the higher power to which Humanity offers their prayers for aid and deliverance. Most would be driven mad with despair if they knew the truth.

traits.locale_text: Der Herrscher des Imperiums und Retter der gesamten Menschheit.

languages.text: À la fois guide, dirigeant et puissance ultime, c'est à lui que l'humanité adresse ses prières, espérant soutien et de délivrance. De nombreuses âmes plongeraient dans la folie du désespoir si elles venaient à découvrir la vérité.
languages.original_text: The guide, the ruler, and the higher power to which Humanity offers their prayers for aid and deliverance. Most would be driven mad with despair if they knew the truth.

traits.locale_text: Chef de l'Imperium et sauveur de l'Humanité.

languages.text: 人类的指引者、统治者与神明，帝国臣民会向帝皇祈祷，祈求援助与救赎。然而，若是帝国臣民知道了关于帝皇的真相，恐怕绝大多数人都会在绝望中陷入疯狂。
languages.original_text: The guide, the ruler, and the higher power to which Humanity offers their prayers for aid and deliverance. Most would be driven mad with despair if they knew the truth.

traits.locale_text: 帝国的统治者，全人类的救主。

languages.text: 導く者であり、支配者であり、人類が施しと救いを求めて祈りを捧げる上位の力を持つ存在である。真実を知った者は、ほとんどが絶望でおかしくなるだろう。
languages.original_text: The guide, the ruler, and the higher power to which Humanity offers their prayers for aid and deliverance. Most would be driven mad with despair if they knew the truth.

traits.locale_text: 帝国の支配者であり、全人類の救世主。

languages.text: El guía, gobernante y poder supremo al que la Humanidad ofrece sus plegarias en busca de ayuda y salvación. La mayoría sucumbiría a la desesperación de conocer la verdad sobre él.
languages.original_text: The guide, the ruler, and the higher power to which Humanity offers their prayers for aid and deliverance. Most would be driven mad with despair if they knew the truth.

traits.locale_text: Gobernador del Imperium y salvador de toda la Humanidad.
